mapper.insert: insert into boardfile(bwno, filename, titlepic) values( #{no}, #{img}, #{title})
insert into boardwrite(mno, bw_titl, bw_con, bw_wdt, bw_div) values(#{mno}, #{bw_titl}, #{bw_con}, curdate(), #{bw_div})
mapper.select: select bw.bwno, bw.bw_titl, bw.bw_con, bw.bw_wdt, m.name, bw.bw_div, bf.filename from boardwrite bw inner join member m on bw.mno = m.mno left outer join boardfile bf on bw.bwno = bf.bwno where bw_div = 'board' and bf.titlepic = 1 order by bwno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

select m.name, bw.bw_titl, bw.bw_con, bw.bw_wdt, bw.bwno, bf.filename, m.mno from boardwrite bw inner join member m on bw.mno = m.mno left outer join boardfile bf on bw.bwno = bf.bwno where bw.bwno= #{no}
select count(*) from boardwrite where bw_div = "board"
mapper.update: update boardwrite set bw_titl=#{bw_titl}, bw_con=#{bw_con}, bw_edt=curdate() where bwno = #{no}
